attributes.action: Increase the State pension in line with inflation, with the credit crunch over 60s are feeling the pinch worse than any Bank managers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish the the Prime Minister to look at the State pension that is grossly inadequate in the present climate, MPs get a in line with inflation rise each year, WHY not the pensioners who are the most vunerable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
